Pricing Plan Section.Layout: Grid layout with multiple columns, each containing a plan card.
Pricing Plan Section.Design: Clean, organized presentation with each plan distinctly outlined and key features highlighted.

Key Elements.Section Title: Centered, bold title inviting visitors to pick a plan.
Key Elements.Plan Cards: Each card includes the plan name, price, key features, and a call-to-action button.
Key Elements.Highlighted Plan: One plan is marked as the 'most popular' with a label for emphasis.
Key Elements.Features List: Each plan's features are listed with icons for clarity.
Key Elements.Call-to-Action Buttons: Prominent buttons for selecting each plan.

Pricing Plan Section.Use Cases: Ideal for SaaS products, subscription services, and any business offering tiered pricing plans.
